definition: to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]

sentences.english: Organized in ascending order of complexity, the material is divided into two parts.
sentences.chinese: 在複雜性的遞升秩序方面組織，材料被分成兩個部分。

sentences.english: The foreign trade orientation of china should be toward securing the dynamically in…
sentences.chinese: 我國外貿的方向應是獲取動態遞升的貿易利益。
